StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
Total experience of 1.2 years, currently working as Sr. Data
Analyst at Research & Analytics, Concentrix Daksh (Former
IBM Daksh) in Telecom and Retail domain.
Experience in text analytics, speech analytics, data
cleaning, data processing, forecasting (ARIMA),
exploratory data analysis and predictive modelling.
Knowledge of Advance Excel like macros, working on creating
templates, sorting and filtering data, Auto formatting etc.
Machine Learning algorithms such as Regression,
Classification, Clustering, KNN, K Means and Decision
Trees for Supervised/Unsupervised learning.
Exploratory Data analysis, Visualization and Inferential Statistics
including Testing of Hypothesis.

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Data Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Description: Transurban is a road operator company that manages and develops urban toll road networks in Australia and North America. They have
different trip packages, computing products etc., I have worked on
Keyword Extraction: Client provided us with chat data generated from bots on websites. So I need to categorize them to 5 levels, so

that similar issues can be resolved quickly in the process
For example: People are charged for video error while capturing the tag
Topic Modelling: To create, analyze and derive actionable insights of chat transcripts. I have used Statistical NLP models like LDA, data
cleaning, data mining, bigram, word cloud, sentiment analysis

Description: LG Electronics is a South Korean Multinational electronics
company. I have worked in collaboration with operations in U.S

Worked on keyword extraction which involves structuring the data by
clustering, creating dictonaries and understanding root cause
analysis from a speech transcribed text data using Verint.
Extracted business related insights, KPI's, QA from text data
Performed speech mining to reduce average handle time, silence
time and hold time
Successfully reduced the average handle time by 60 seconds on
reducing hold time over period of 3 months. This helped in increasing efficiency of utilizing the resources
Created visually impactful dashboards in PowerBI and automated
score cards which can track the agent performance.

Description: LG Electronics is a South Korean Multinational electronics
company. I have collegiately worked with stake holders of LGE

Worked on forecasting for LGE on returns and replacements. Steps
included were converting the data into time series model using R and exploring data by decomposing into various components such as
trend, seasonality and randomness
Assisted 10 LOB like Jcpenny, Homedepot etc., of LGE by providing
analytical insights
Improved reduction in damaged goods

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 65% of this job
Degreed Accounting describes 100% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Electronics/Telecommunication) from Christ University, Bangalore in 2018
